parameters.name: IMDBid
parameters.description: IMDB ID of the movie to return

parameters.name: MovieYear
parameters.description: Release year of the movies to return

apiDescription:
Hydra Movies is a streaming service that holds information on thousands of popular movies. 

The Hydra Movies API gives you access to [their entire collection of full movies.](https://hydramovies.com)

Each film returned provides you with the following data:

- Movie Title
- Movie Release Year
- Genre
- Movie Summary
- Movie Poster
- IMDB ID
- IMDB Rating
- Runtime
- Language
- YouTube trailer
